channel.description: Recent content in health on HeroLFG

item.title: Vampires and Zombies
item.description: Abstract Summary The monsters are within us. The battle starts within and never ends. Introduction We get to figure this out together and create peace on Earth as we solve the biggest problem and embody the best answer. Attention Feeding Our attention is the most valuable resource in the world and vampires eat it up. We should not feed on other people’s attention and we should avoid giving our attention to vampires.

item.title: Content Creation
item.description: Every time I am about to share information with other people I can transform that information into a blog post like I am doing now. When I create a blog post, I get to own my content and control my content. I can then share a link to my post on all of my social media networks. I can also update my blog post so that all of the links I shared get updated as well.
